metadata.name: Lain Light
metadata.description:
It was our last set, in my apartment, where the sun was starting to rise high. Dazzled, I closed the curtain to protect her from the sun. Like a cat, she lay down on this sofa, in the hollows of the light, looking at me with a slightly teasing look.  

The "Suspended Moments" are those fractions of seconds, where time has lengthened between her and me. Moments that have become timeless in my memory.  
Even after years, a simple look at this portrait reminds me of all those moments spent with her, her dance steps, our laughter, and the light that rested on her.
